name: Space Odyssey
description:
Space Odyssey is about exploring the sci-fi universe, enjoy the pleasable graphics along with amazing soundtracks.Current Features:
* Six different "Galaxies" to choose from
* Pleasable Graphics
* Enjoyable Sountrack(s)
* PC SupportComing Soon:
* HTC Vive Compatibility
* Oculus Rift Compatibility
* X Box Controller Support
* PS4 Controller Support
